title: John Howell – 2021 Comments on Hartlepool By-Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Howell, the Conservative MP for Henley, on 7 May 2021.
content:
The people of Hartlepool have made it clear they want positive change and will not accept being taken for granted. We need to work hard to repay that trust. This means delivering on our plan for jobs and investment.
